display_name: Calculated - RDI in supine body position (>= 5% desaturation)
description: missing if sleep time in supine position is 0 or if position sensore was not working or if studies scored as sleep/wake
calculation: rdim5ps  = 60*(hrembp5 + hnrbp5 + carbp5 + canbp5 + oarbp5 + oanbp5 + marbp5 + manrbp5)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
